child.label: Cartoon
child.description: A vibrant and often humorous style, characterized by exaggerated features, bold outlines, and bright colors, reminiscent of animated shows and comic strips.

child.label: Colouring Book
child.description: Simple, clean outlines without shading or color, designed to be filled in. Focuses on clear forms and shapes.

child.label: Claymation
child.description: An art style that mimics the look of stop-motion animation using clay figures. Features distinct textures and a handcrafted, tactile feel.

child.label: Comic Book
child.description: Dynamic and expressive, with strong lines, vibrant palettes, and often dramatic perspectives, capturing the narrative energy of graphic novels.

child.label: Doodle
child.description: Spontaneous, whimsical, and often playful drawings, typically simple and unrefined, as if sketched casually on paper.

child.label: Fantasy Art
child.description: Imaginative and enchanting, depicting mythical creatures, magical realms, heroic figures, and epic adventures, often with a sense of wonder and escapism.

child.label: Kawaii
child.description: A Japanese aesthetic emphasizing cuteness, characterized by rounded shapes, large expressive eyes, soft colors, and a generally adorable, charming appeal.

child.label: Pixel Art
child.description: Created using individual square pixels, resulting in a distinctively blocky, retro appearance, reminiscent of early video games and digital graphics.

child.label: Storybook
child.description: Warm, inviting, and often nostalgic, this style evokes classic children's book illustrations, with gentle textures, soft lighting, and a narrative charm.

child.label: Watercolor
child.description: Features translucent washes of color, soft edges, and a fluid, ethereal quality, mimicking traditional watercolor paintings with visible brushstrokes and blends.

adult.label: Abstract
adult.description: Non-representational art that focuses on shapes, colors, forms, and gestural marks rather than depicting objective reality, inviting subjective interpretation.

adult.label: Anime
adult.description: Inspired by Japanese animation, characterized by distinctive large eyes, expressive facial features, dynamic poses, and often vibrant, detailed backgrounds.

adult.label: Black and White Line Art
adult.description: Emphasizes contours, forms, and contrasts using only black and white. Can range from intricate and detailed to bold and minimalist.

adult.label: Cyberpunk
adult.description: A futuristic dystopian aesthetic, often featuring towering neon-lit cityscapes, advanced technology, gritty urban environments, and a blend of high-tech and low-life elements.

adult.label: Fantasy Art
adult.description: Imaginative and enchanting, depicting mythical creatures, magical realms, heroic figures, and epic adventures, often with a sense of wonder and escapism.

adult.label: Gothic
adult.description: Dark, mysterious, and often melancholic, featuring elements like ancient architecture, dramatic lighting, supernatural themes, and a sense of foreboding or romance.

adult.label: Impressionistic
adult.description: Characterized by visible, loose brushstrokes, open composition, and an emphasis on capturing the fleeting effects of light and atmosphere rather than precise detail.

adult.label: Minimalist
adult.description: A clean and uncluttered design approach, focusing on essential elements, simplicity, and often using limited color palettes, clean lines, and negative space for impact.

adult.label: Oil Painting
adult.description: Rich textures, deep and luminous colors, and layered effects, mimicking traditional oil paintings with visible brushwork and a sense of depth and realism.

adult.label: Photorealistic
adult.description: Highly detailed and precise, aiming to replicate the appearance of a photograph with extreme accuracy in rendering light, shadow, texture, and minute details.

adult.label: Sci-Fi Art
adult.description: Explores futuristic concepts, space exploration, advanced technology, and alien worlds, often with sleek designs, cosmic vistas, and themes of innovation or cosmic mystery.

adult.label: Steampunk
adult.description: A retro-futuristic style inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery, featuring intricate gears, brass, clockwork, and Victorian-era aesthetics.

adult.label: Surreal
adult.description: Dreamlike and often bizarre, combining unrelated elements in unexpected or illogical ways to create a sense of the subconscious, the fantastical, or the unsettling.

adult.label: Watercolor
adult.description: Features translucent washes of color, soft edges, and a fluid, ethereal quality, mimicking traditional watercolor paintings with visible brushstrokes and blends.
